tasks.task: Cutting and preparing bamboo for biochar production
subtasks: Using loppers to cut bamboo
Using a saber saw to trim bamboo branches
Using a table saw to cut bamboo to size
Building a biochar pit
Starting a fire at the top of the pit and adding bamboo
Monitoring temperature and managing combustion to prevent ash formation
Using a hose to steam clean the biochar remaining in the pit

tasks.task: Chipping and shredding biochar
subtasks: Using an electric chipper shredder to reduce biochar particles

tasks.task: Mixing biochar with composted cow manure
subtasks: Transporting composted cow manure using a tractor
Creating a compost pile with biochar, water, and microbes

tasks.task: Understanding the biochar production process
subtasks: Recognizing the role of pyrolysis in forming biochar's stable carbon structures
Considering the environmental benefits of biochar in carbon sequestration
Acknowledging the scalability and potential of biochar production
